tasks.label: Build
tasks.command: if (Test-Path Makefile) { make } elseif (Test-Path ../Makefile) { make -C .. } else { echo 'No Makefile found'; exit 1 }

tasks.label: Clean
tasks.command: if (Test-Path Makefile) { make clean } elseif (Test-Path ../Makefile) { make clean -C .. } else { echo 'No Makefile found'; exit 1 }

tasks.label: Flash
tasks.command: if (Test-Path Makefile) { make flash } elseif (Test-Path ../Makefile) { make flash -C .. } else { echo 'No Makefile found'; exit 1 }
